# enableEditing()

**Instance Method**

Enables editing when it’s safe again to make changes to a document.

## Declaration

```swift
func enableEditing()
```

## Discussion

Subclasses should override this method to allow the user to edit the document when it’s safe to do so. This method override should be paired with an override of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument/disableEditing()]. The default implementation of this method does nothing.

## Disabling and enabling editing

- **disableEditing()**: Disables editing when it’s unsafe to make changes to a document.
